alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western and northern Russell County through 615 PM CDT... At 550 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Russell, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, deadly lightning, locally very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russell, Gorham, Luray, Bunker Hill, Paradise, Waldo, Russell Airport and Wilson Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 175 and 192. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
